CBRAIN is an infrastructure that connects researchers from all walks of science and their data to high performance and cloud computing in a easy to manage, reproducible, and user-friendly manner.
Get Started
Accessibility
Ability to work across multiple machines and filesystems.
Efficiency
Quickly moving compute and data behind the scenes.
Reproducibility
Strict standards and pipelines allow for reproducible results.
